overview:
David Stewart is a passionate entrepreneur based in Seattle Washington, focusing on restaurant industry technology.

David spent 10 years in various levels of management and ownership for restaurants. Managing a restaurant is one of David’s favorite things to do, he love working with diverse teams and inspiring people to push themselves to a new level, and learn new things.

After a number of years in the restaurant industry he noticed that technology in the industry is lacking, and stagnant. He set out to determine what kind of impact he could have. Which brought him to found a company, Digital Restaurant Solutions, which is in the business of supporting restaurants and developing for restaurants.
